text: Jardines is a rapid transit station in San Juan agglomeration, Puerto Rico. It is located between Deportivo and Torrimar on the only line of the Tren Urbano system, in Bayamón. The trial service ran in 2004, however, the regular service only started on 6 June 2005. ==References== Category:Tren Urbano stations Category:Railway stations in the United States opened in 2004 Category:2004 establishments in Puerto Rico
title: Jardines station
